about.title: About me
about.description:
I’m a software developer in training, 18 years old, currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at FIAP. For the past 11 months, I’ve been working at MRM McCann Worldgroup, contributing to agile teams on digital innovation projects.

While my current focus is more on front-end development using technologies like React and Next.js, I also have full stack experience gained through academic and personal projects, particularly in back-end development with Node.js, Java, Python and Strapi.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can find some of the most relevant projects I’ve developed throughout my journey as a developer.
projects.titleProject2: LP Development – God of War Ragnarok
projects.descriptionProject1: The application allows users to enter their average electricity consumption and location to receive a personalized estimate of savings with solar energy.
projects.descriptionProject2: Themed landing page inspired by the universe of God of War: Ragnarok, focused on impactful visuals and performance.
projects.descriptionProject3: I developed a project that involved creating an intelligent device for real-time monitoring of three essential parameters: Temperature, Water pH, and Water Level.
projects.descriptionProject4: E-commerce simulator with a responsive layout where users can view products, add them to the cart, and simulate a purchase.
projects.descriptionProject5: The system allows account creation, balance inquiry, deposits, withdrawals, and PIX transfers. I used enums for account types (CHECKING, SAVINGS, SALARY) and account status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE).
